catalog_info.title: Quantum Mechanics II
catalog_info.notes: Tu., Th., 10–11:30 and a weekly section to be arranged
catalog_info.description: Time independent perturbation theory and its application to fine and hyperfine structure of atoms. Time dependent perturbation theory: two level systems, emission and absorption of radiation. Quantum theory of electromagnetism: the photon. Relativistic quantum mechanics: the Dirac equation. Quantum information theory. Scattering theory.
